instances.description: Pixelfed is an image sharing platform, an ethical alternative to centralized platforms.

rules.text: No harrasment, no stalking, no doxxing
No racism or relativization of racism.
No sexism or relativization of sexism.
No xenophobia or relativization of xenophobia.
No discriminating against gender identities or sexual orientations, or relativizing them.
No advertising.
No intentionally misleading content (including new/alt-right conspiracy theories or scams like cryptocurrencies).
No content that violates the laws of the Federal Republic of Germany.

instances.description:
Create. Share. Discover.
Collect. Follow. Explore.
Curate. Comment. Like.

rules.text: Add the NSFW flag to media containing sex or violence.
We do not accept content illegal in Canada, Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism.
Sexual depictions of children is not allowed.
We do not accept racism, sexism, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or xenophobia and/or nationalism.
We do not accept TERFS and your Freedom of Speech is no permission for you to insult other people or to violate their rights.
No NFT content. None at all.
Contact: https://mastodon.social/@metapixl or mail hello@metapixl.com

rules.text: Be nice to each other
Do not publish advertisement
Do not publish conspiracy myths
Do not publish content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
Do not publish content promoting the ideology of National Socialism
Do not publish content that is hateful towards specific individuals or groups, or intended to cause or incite harm
For a very very detailed CoC, use the one of social.tchncs.de as reference: https://social.tchncs.de/about/more

A Mastodon instance hosted in New Zealand. Made for kiwis and honorary kiwis home and abroad!

Run by donations @ https://donate.fediservices.nz

rules.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment or doxxing other users
Be kind to each other
Personal accounts only; No bots, Business, Commercial or Organisation accounts.
Content hosted from pixelfed.nz (Any text/media) may not be reused without express permission
No NSFW Content
Must have some link to New Zealand. This is to try keep our Local timeline local #MadeInNZ.

instances.description: NixOrigin is an ethical alternative to Instagram. No Ads, No Tracking,  No Kidding. Just Share â€¢ Connect and Explore.

rules.text: No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No racism, sexism, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia, islamophobia and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation of all of the above.
You may not post, threaten to post, or encourage others to post anyone's private information without their express permission
You may not violate the intellectual property rights, including copyrights and trademarks of others.
You must respect everyone regardless of their gender, age, sexual orientation, ethnicity, religion, color or culture.
Show kindness and compassion towards others, and try to understand their perspectives and experiences.
Offer help and assistance to those who need it, whether it's a listening ear, a shoulder to cry on, or a practical solution to a problem.
Be accountable for your actions and take responsibility for your mistakes.
Do not engage in spamming.
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting

instances.short_description: NixOrigin is an ethical alternative to Instagram. No Ads, No Tracking,  No Kidding. Just Share â€¢ Connect and Explore.
instances.title: NixOrigin

instances.description: This is an instance dedicated to people who paint miniatures, enjoy tabletop games and other nerdy things - all creatures welcome.

rules.text: Don't be an asshole.
Seriously, don't be an asshole.

Being an asshole includes, but is not limited to harassment, posting content that promotes the oppression of others because of who they are, who they love, what they believe in (Fascism is not a belief, it's a crime.), .. like, you know what being an asshole is. Don't be one.
If you decide to be an asshole, there will be consequences.
If your assholery breaks the (German or Austrian) law, these consequences might include legal action.
So, don't be an asshole. Be excellent to each other.

Fedipix.de soll eine freie und alternative Plattform sein. Basierend auf Pixelfed soll es insbesondere eine Datensparsame Alternative zu Instagram darstellen. Wir betreiben diese Seite Werbe- und Kostenfrei und tracken unsere Nutzer nicht. Das ist insbesondere deshalb schon nicht mÃ¶glich, da wir keine Logfiles speichern.
Dieser Service wird bereitgestellt von:

TMKIS Internet Services
Scanbox #00478
Ehrenbergstr. 16a
10245 Berlin
E-Mail: mail@fedipix.de

rules.text: Poste keine pornographischen oder sexualisierten Inhalte. Dazu gehÃ¶ren auch Witze und Kommentare.
Sei immer freundlich und hÃ¶flich. Behandle andere mit Respekt.
Nochmal ganz deutlich: Wir dulden keine nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine FÃ¶rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus!

VerÃ¶ffentliche keinen Spam oder kommerzielle Werbung. Kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang bedeutet, wenn die verÃ¶ffentlichten Inhalte keinen persÃ¶nlichen Bezug aufweisen und eindeutig dazu gedacht sind, direkt oder indirekt Geld zu erwirtschaften.
Keine Killerphrasen, Scheinargumente, schwarze Rhetorik oder Sophismus
Die Nutzung oder BefÃ¼rwortung von rassistischer, sexistischer, homophober, transphober, behindertenfeindlicher und anderweitig diskriminierender oder hasserfÃ¼llter Sprache wird nicht geduldet
Verharmlosende oder gutheiÃŸende Inhalte zu WeiÃŸer Vorherrschaft, Antisemitismus, Transphobie oder anderen hasserfÃ¼llten Ideologien werden nicht geduldet.
Halte dich an die in Deutschland geltenden Gesetze (verbietet u.a. auch gewaltverherrlichende Inhalte).
Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen/Fakenews (inkl. VerschwÃ¶rungstheorien) sind hier unerwÃ¼nscht

instances.description: Pixelfed is an image sharing platform, an ethical alternative to centralized platforms.

rules.text: Bots must be clearly marked as bots and MUST be opt-in.
Commercial use of this service is prohibited without specific written permission first. Commercial accounts will be deleted without warning.
Be civil. Treat others with respect.
Abuse will not be tolerated in any form.
The admins have final say. Our instance. Our rules.
Posted images should be decribed with alt-text to ensure a good experience for all.
Use content warnings when appropriate; encourage others to do so. It is Fediverse culture.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No content illegal in Queensland Australia, or California United States (our data centre jurisdictions) is permitted.

instances.description: This is the sibling site of pleroma.anduin.net. Please see the About page on pleroma.anduin.net; the Terms of Service and Code of Conduct stated there apply also here.

rules.text: This service and the server it's on is privately owned and operated, and is neither affiliated with nor owned or controlled by any corporate entity.
It is open to whomever I, or my appointed admins and moderators, agree to provide the service to.
The use of the service is subject to the Code of Conduct (see 'terms' page) and a general expectation of decency, good faith, and absence of malice.

I can, at any time, for any reason, and with no prior warning, terminate the service or individual accounts on it. (I'm not saying that I will, in fact I would hate to do so, but this is my "exit clause".)

The service is hosted in Oslo, Norway, and is subject to relevant local law regarding its operation. That said, I am not monitoring its content actively but am required to take action if made aware of content that, by law or otherwise, required my action.
There is no guarantee of privacy for any content entering or leaving the system. The current Fediverse is not well suited for strict privacy-demanding use cases.
I am making every effort to run a tight ship (and have done so since the late 90s), but nobody's perfect and no system is entirely secure.
Do not post anything that you would not want me to see. I am root.

instances.description:
GSI is an old acronym from friends of the past and present: Great Sources of Interests. A fitting acronym for a Pixelfed instance.

This instance is hosted and managed by @eitch. This instance is for friends and family.

This instance is hosted in Switzerland on a connection by ISP init7.

rules.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in Switzerland and the EU
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotional campaigns, and SEO.
User must be at least 16 years old and have a residence in Switzerland

Inactive accounts will be deleted. Accounts are considered inactive if there is no activity during the last three months. An admin will contact you to see if your account is still active, if you don't respond in 3 days, the account is considered inactive and will be deleted.
You must fill out your bio with a few details about yourself and add a profile photo.
